items.question: What documents are needed for a loan application?
items.answer: For a loan application, you will need: ID card, proof of address, recent pay slips (3 months), and recent bank statements. The exact list may vary depending on the loan type.

items.question: What is the processing time for an application?
items.answer: We process most applications within 24 to 48 hours. Once approved, funds are typically transferred within 3 to 5 business days.

items.question: Are there any application fees?
items.answer: No, PrêtFacile does not charge any application fees. Our compensation is included in the interest rate, ensuring complete transparency.
